title: Step 2
name: Exercise: Take 5
congrats: Well done, your progress has been saved. Continue to your next step below.

data.value: Let’s start by reflecting on your LifeActs from Module 1. If you’ve used your Potentialife app, you’ll see your jottings below.

items.label: Your ViaMe strengths diagnostic helped you identify 3 important character strengths. Think of a specific situation when one or more of these strengths was at play.
items.takeaways: l1.m1.lifeact_notes_1 - these are my notes, I'm so strong

items.label: You exercise your strengths 60% of the time at work, and 56% of the time outside work. Is there a discrepancy, and what is driving it?
items.takeaways: l1.m1.lifeact_notes_2 - I'm strong outside work but even stronger inside, wow i'm great

items.label: Are your chosen character strengths obvious to others? Discuss them with a colleague, friend or your buddy group.
items.takeaways: l1.m1.lifeact_notes_3 - Character strengths can be abstract

items.label: Let's get practical! You decided on an idea to help put your character strengths into practice.  Give it a go today!
items.takeaways: l1.m1.lifeact_notes_4 - ideas are great, actions are better! I'm getting this done today!

items.label: Teaching is a great way of learning. Take 5 minutes to share the key points from this module with a colleague, friend or family member who isn't on the program.
items.takeaways: l1.m1.lifeact_notes_5 - teaching is new to me but I'm going to go for it!

data.label: Reflect on your LifeAct from last week, what worked? Note down your thoughts.
data.name: reflect_on_lifeact
